alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL PINELLAS AND NORTHERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Citrus Park to Palm River-Clair Mel. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Greater Northdale, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Riverview, Lake Magdalene, University, Keystone, East Lake, West Park, Oldsmar, Busch Gardens, and University Of Tampa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
